activation.ReallyYourEmail: Qhov no puas yog koj tus email chaw nyob, {{1}}? Yog tias muaj, nyem qhov no los teeb tsa koj tus lej password thiab qhib koj tus account.

LinkToUnsubscribe: Nov yog qhov txuas rau unsubscribe yog tias koj tsis xav tau email ntxiv.
SeeHistory: Saib keeb kwm kev them nyiaj rau {{1}}

charge.HasBeenCharged: Hav, qhov no tsuas yog qhia rau koj paub tias {{1}} tau raug them {{2}} rau {{3}} los ntawm {{4}}

charged.HavePaid: Hav {{1}}, qhov no tsuas yog kev lees paub sai tias koj tau them nyiaj tiav {{2}} rau {{3}} rau {{4}}

resend.Thanks: Ua tsaug rau koj tuaj xyuas {{1}}
resend.YouAreReceiving: Koj tau txais email no vim hais tias ib tug neeg nkag mus rau koj qhov chaw nyob email thiab nyem "tsis nco qab lo lus zais". Yog tias tsis yog koj, tsuas yog tsis quav ntsej cov lus no.
resend.Reset: Txhawm rau rov pib koj tus lej password, nyem {{1}}

subscription.YouHaveStarted: Hav {{1}}, koj tau pib koj qhov kev tso npe rau {{2}} nrog {{3}} ntawm {{4}} rau {{5}} hli.
subscription.HasStarted: Qhov no tsuas yog qhia rau koj paub tias {{1}}, tau pib lawv cov npe rau {{2}} nrog {{3}} ntawm {{4}} rau {{5}} hli.
